message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9,500 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $9,500 is simply too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $10,250? I'm confident this price is fair considering the value of the product.
I understand your position, Alice. While I respect the value of your product, I believe we can reach an agreement closer to my initial proposal. I am willing to offer $10,000 for the product.
